Description: For sale is this stunning Gibson Custom ES-339 Figured semi-hollowbody in a high-gloss Vintage Sunburst finish. The luxurious ES-359 is essentially to the ES-339 as the Les Paul Custom is to the Standard (or more closely related, the ES-355 is to the ES-335). The “Custom” appointments include multi-ply binding on the front and back of the body, the headstock and the pickguard (faux tortoise), mother-of-pearl block inlays on the fingerboard, split-diamond inlays on the headstock, gold hardware, and a genuine Ebony fingerboard (no, it is NOT richlite). Additionally, the top, back and sides sport some very tasty flamed maple, which is an upgraded feature for this model. Loaded with ’57 Classic, this Gibson has a range of tones from sweet, warm and subtle to snarling, aggressive and angry…it just depends on where you want it to take you! Additionally, the ES-359 has been given a Lucille-type tapered neck carve that gets chunkier as you go up the neck. Weighs 7lb 3oz and comes with original Gibson Custom hardshell case. COA not included. This guitar is pre-owned and does show minor signs of use (a few small dings, some buckle marks on the back, etc - see detailed photos), but is in overall great shape and plays and sounds incredible.
Title: 2010 Gibson Custom Shop ES-359 Figured - Vintage Sunburst like ES-339 ES-355
ConditionDescription: This guitar is preowned and does show some signs of use, but is in overall great condition. See detailed photos and description for condition.
